Claire Hau

Korean: 클레어 하우

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Hong Yejin
Native name:

Introduction

Claire Hau is a South Korean independent singer. She made her debut on January 23, 2019, with ‘갬성드링크프로젝트 1SHOT’. She changed her stage name from Hauzee to Claire Hau in 2020.
